data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Dharwad, Karnataka, India today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dharwad, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Dharwad, Karnataka, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 20,317 believers in Dharwad, Karnataka, India how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Dharwad, Karnataka, India to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Sardar (Hindu traditions) people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, move the 20,317 believers in the county of Dharwad to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Dharwad, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.section_summary:
the county of Dharwad, Karnataka, India has a population of 1,847,000.

We estimate Dharwad has 20,317 people who might know Jesus, 22,410 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,804,273 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the county of Dharwad to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
